name: performance_test
test_prompts: This is a performance test prompt designed to measure inference speed and accuracy.
Generate a detailed explanation of how BitNet 1-bit quantization works in neural networks.
Write a comprehensive comparison between traditional 16-bit and 1-bit neural network inference.
Explain the mathematical foundations behind BitNet's quantization algorithm and its benefits.
Describe the implementation challenges and solutions for efficient 1-bit matrix operations.
description: Performance-focused test fixture with longer prompts
